definition: (slang) (usu. of a woman) sb who looks stunning from behind/sb who has a great figure but not necessarily an attractive face/abbr. for 背影殺手|背影杀手[bei4 ying3 sha1 shou3]
the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
(slang) (usu. of a woman) sb who looks stunning from behind/sb who has a great figure but not necessarily an attractive face/abbr. to 背殺|背杀[bei4 sha1]
(Internet slang) flattering photo (pun on 照片[zhao4 pian4])/photoshopped picture
(Internet slang) to post a photo of oneself online
(of a woman) to have nice curves/buxom/shapely
Matou town in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
